resource.description: A resouce representing association of a bank account resource to a customer account. Required for delivery of currency.

attribute.name: nickname
attribute.comment: A short nickname for this bank account particular to the customer.

attribute.name: comment
attribute.comment: A brief description of the account that can be used by the customer.

attribute.name: email-address
attribute.comment: An email address belonging to the beneficiary to send notification emails to.

attribute.name: customer-reference
attribute.comment: A reference that can be used by the customer to identify this beneficiary. The customer is responsible for guaranteeing its uniqueness.

attribute.name: default-remittance-information
attribute.comment: Default text to be included in any payment to this beneficiary if no payment specific text is provided. Limited to 35 characters.

attribute.name: source
attribute.comment: Indicates whether the customer is the beneficial owner of this account. Assumed false if not present.

relationship.name: customer-account
relationship.comment: The customer account that this resource relates to.

relationship.name: bank-account
relationship.comment: The bank account that this resource relates to.

url.comment: Returns collection of all beneficiaries for a customer account.
